description: Starting positions of strings of 2 1's in the decimal expansion of Pi.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pi Digits
Index entries for sequences related to the number Pi
mathematica: a=RealDigits[Pi,10,8! ];lst={};Do[b=a[[1]][[n]];c=a[[1]][[n+1]];If[b==1&&c==1,AppendTo[lst,n-1]],{n,8!-1}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 02 2009 *)Flatten[Position[Partition[RealDigits[Pi,10,4000][[1]],2,1],_?(#=={1,1}&) ]]-1 (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 01 2013 *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 10 2010
